Name: Assessed
Description: NAACC Stream Crossing Assessment, 0=No and 1=Yes

Name: SurveyID
Description: NAACC Survey Identification

Name: CrosCode
Description: NAACC Crossing Code (xy and decimal latitude and longitude)

Name: CrosType
Description: Stream Crossing Type (ex. Culvert)

Name: AopNaacc
Description: NAACC Stream Crossing Classification (No AOP = 1, Reduced AOP = 2, and Full AOP = 3)

Name: AqScNaac
Description: NAACC Aquatic Passability Score (0.00 - 1.00)

Name: DateObsd
Description: Date of Stream Crossing Assessment

Name: Eval
Description: NAACC Aquatic Passability Evaluation (Severe barrier = 0-0.19, Significant barrier = 0.2-0.39, Moderate barrier = 0.4-0.59, Minor barrier = 0.6-0.79, Insignificant barrier = 0.8-0.99, No barrier = 1.0)

Name: GPSx
Description: GPS longitude (decimal degree)

Name: GPSy
Description: GPS latitude (decimal degree)

Name: LastUpdat
Description: Late update to NAACC

Name: Road
Description: Road name

Name: CrState
Description: State name

Name: StrmName
Description: Stream name from USGS topographic maps

Name: CrTown
Description: Community name

Name: gWshed
Description: NHD HUC8 watershed name

Name: Drainage Area
Description: Area that drains to a point on a stream

Name: Mean Basin Elevation
Description: Mean basin elevation
Citation: USGS Zarriello reports

Name: Storage Area
Description: Percentage of water bodies and wetlands determined from the NLCD 2006
Citation: USGS Zarriello reports

Name: Mean Basin Slope
Description: Mean basin slope computed from 10 m DEM
Citation: USGS Zarriello reports

Name: 10-year Peakflow
Description: Maximum instantaneous flow that occurs with a 10% annual exceedance probability

Name: 25-year Peakflow
Description: Maximum instantaneous flow that occurs with a 4% annual exceedance probability

Name: 50-year Peakflow
Description: Maximum instantaneous flow that occurs with a 2% annual exceedance probability

Name: 100-year Peakflow
Description: Maximum instantaneous flow that occurs with a 1% annual exceedance probability

Name: Bankfull Width
Description: Bankfull width
Citation: USGS Zarriello reports

Name: Bankfull Mean Depth
Description: Bankfull depth
Citation: USGS Zarriello reports

Name: Bankfull XS Area
Description: Bankfull area
Citation: USGS Zarriello reports

Name: Coldwater Fisheries Resources
Description: Stream is a coldwater fishery. Boolean value 0=no, 1=yes

Name: Essential Fish Habitat
Description: Stream is a essential fish habitat. Boolean value 0=no, 1=yes

Name: Anadromous Fish Run
Description: Stream is a Anadromous fish run. Boolean value 0=no, 1=yes

Name: Areas of Critical Environmental Concerns
Description: Stream is an Area of Critical Environmental Concerns . Boolean value 0=no, 1=yes

Name: BioMap 2 Aquatic Core
Description: Stream is a BioMap 2 Aquatic Core. Boolean value 0=no, 1=yes

Name: Wild and Scenic Rivers
Description: Stream is a Wild and Scenic Rivers. Boolean value 0=no, 1=yes

Name: Habitat Quality Score
Description: Habitat quality score. Sum of �yes�s (1�s) for coldwater fisheries, essential fish habitat, Anadromous fish run, Area of Critical Environmental Concern, Biomap2 aquatic core, and Wild and Scenic River (values can be from 0 � 6; 0 = General quality, 1 = high quality, >=2 = highest quality)

Name: Critical Linkages
Description: Statewide Critical Linkages Percentile (0 = < top 20%, 1 = top 20%, 2 = top 10%, and 3 = top 5%): Derived from UMass DSL data

Name: Cold Water Critical Linkage
Description: Coldwater Critical Linkages Percentile (0 = < top 30%, 1 = top 30%, 2 = top 20%, and 3 = top 10%): Derived from UMass DSL data

Name: Restoration Connectivity Potential Score
Description: Connectivity Restoration Potential Score. Derived from Statewide Critical Linkages and Coldwater Critical Linkages values. Sum of CRPCLINK or CEPCWCLINK values. Scoring TBD.

Name: Maximum Extent Practicable (MEP) Cost Factor
Description: Maximum Extent Practicable (MEP) Cost Factor. (HQSCORE and CRPSCORE)

Name: MassDOT road functional classification
Description: MassDOT highway classification code values 0-7 classification codes TBD

Name: MassDOT associated hydraulic design flow
Description: Hydraulic Design Flood Annual Chance (%) (Annual Exceedence Probability), 10=10%AEP, 25=4% AEP, 50=2%AEP, 100=1%AEP

Name: Box Culvert Span
Description: Span of box culvert design MA meets Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Box Culvert Height
Description: Height of box culvert design MA meets Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Box Culvert Length
Description: Length of box culvert design MA meets Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Box Culvert Area
Description: Area of box culvert design MA meets Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Box Culvert Material
Description: Box culvert material meets MA meets Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Box MA SCS Culvert Type
Description: Culvert design (3-sided box culvert meets MA Stream Crossing Standards)
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2013

Name: Box MA SCS Embedment
Description: Not applicable for 3-sided box culvert designs
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2014

Name: Box MA SCS Substrate
Description: Material at culvert bottom (Natural meets MA Stream Crossing Standards)
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2015

Name: Box MA SCS Velocity Ratio
Description: TBD - variety of flows or just some low-flow like 90% flow duration
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2016

Name: Box MA SCS Span Ratio
Description: Ratio of box culvert span to bankfull width. (Meets MA Stream Crossing Standards >= 1.2 )
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2017

Name: Box MA SCS Openness Ratio
Description: Ratio of box culvert cross-sectional area to length. (Meets MA Stream Crossing Standards >= 0.82)
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2018

Name: Arch Culvert Span
Description: Span of arch culvert design meets MA Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Arch Culvert Height
Description: Height of arch culvert design meets MA Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Arch Culvert Length
Description: Length of arch culvert design meets MA Stream Crossing Standards

Description: Area of arch culvert design meets MA Stream Crossing Standards

Description: Arch culvert material meets MA Stream Crossing Standards

Description: Culvert design (3-sided arch culvert meets MA Stream Crossing Standards)
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2013

Name: Arch MA SCS Embedment
Description: Not applicable for 3-sided arch culvert designs
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2014

Description: Material at culvert bottom (Natural meets MA Stream Crossing Standards)

Description: Ratio of arch culvert span to bankfull width. (Meets MA Stream Crossing Standards >= 1.2 )

Name: Arch MA SCS Openness Ratio
Description: Ratio of arch culvert cross-sectional area to length. (Meets MA Stream Crossing Standards >= 0.82)
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2018

Name: Pipe Culvert Diameter
Description: Diameter of pipe culvert design meets MA Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Pipe Culvert Length
Description: Length of pipe culvert design meets MA Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Pipe Culvert Area
Description: Area of pipe culvert design meets MA Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Pipe Culvert Material
Description: Pipe culvert material meets MA Stream Crossing Standards

Name: Pipe MA SCS Culvert Type
Description: Culvert design (pipe does not meets MA Stream Crossing Standards)
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2013

Name: Pipe MA SCS Embedment
Description: Depth of buried section of culvert. (2 ft meets MA Stream Crossing Standards for diameters < 8ft)
Citation: Singler et al MA Streams Crossing Handbook 2014

Name: Pipe MA SCS Substrate
Description: Material at culvert bottom (Natural meets MA Stream Crossing Standards)
